item.title: OpenAI推出ChatGPT健康版，可解读检测结果与饮食建议
item.description: OpenAI在ChatGPT中推出新功能，用户可借此分析医疗检测结果、准备就诊事宜，并获取饮食及锻炼计划指导——这标志着该公司迄今为止在医疗保健领域最重大的举措。【原文：OpenAI is introducing a new feature in ChatGPT that will allow users to analyze medical test results, prepare for doctors appointments and seek guidance on diets and workout routines — marking the company’s biggest push yet into the health care sector.】

item.title: 银行经济学家呼吁税制改革以重振加拿大经济
item.description: 加拿大各大银行的经济学家呼吁总理马克·卡尼推行税制改革，认为其最新预算投资对提升竞争力收效甚微。【原文：Economists at Canada’s biggest banks are calling on Prime Minister Mark Carney to reform taxes, arguing his latest budget investments won’t meaningfully move the needle on competitiveness.】

item.title: 德国当局调查另一起电网攻击事件
item.description: 德国检察官正在调查一起针对杜塞尔多夫附近变电站的未遂袭击事件。就在几天前，柏林曾因类似事件引发大面积停电。【原文：German prosecutors are investigating a failed attack on a substation near Düsseldorf, in the west of the country, days after a similar incident triggered a power blackout in Berlin.】

item.title: 黑石、住宅建筑商股价因特朗普住房言论暴跌
item.description: 在特朗普总统表示将采取行动禁止机构投资者购买独栋住宅后，黑石集团及其他房地产相关公司的股价应声下跌。【原文：Shares of Blackstone Inc. and other housing-related companies tumbled after President Donald Trump said he would move to ban institutional investors from buying single-family homes.】

item.title: 戴比尔斯押注印度富豪阶层以提振天然钻石需求
item.description: 戴比尔斯押注印度日益壮大的富裕阶层将推动天然钻石需求增长，尽管全球市场仍面临挑战，且悬而未决的美印贸易协议正扰乱供应链。【原文：De Beers is betting on India’s surging affluent class to fuel growth in natural diamond demand, even as the global market remains challenging and a pending US-India trade deal disrupts supply chains.】

item.title: 赞比亚放弃将国际货币基金组织信贷安排延长一年的计划
item.description: 华盛顿国际货币基金组织周三表示，赞比亚已决定不寻求延长其将于本月到期的国际货币基金组织计划，该计划原定延长一年。这一转变将令投资者感到意外。【原文：Zambia has decided against pursuing a one-year extension of its International Monetary Fund program that’s set to expire this month, the Washington-based lender said on Wednesday, an about turn that will surprise investors.】

item.title: 《华尔街日报》称Anthropic以3500亿美元估值融资100亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，开发聊天机器人Claude的人工智能初创公司Anthropic计划进行新一轮融资，拟筹集100亿美元资金，融资前公司估值将达3500亿美元。【原文：Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup behind the chatbot Claude, is planning to raise $10 billion in a funding round that would value the company at $350 billion before the new investment, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 雀巢扩大召回部分婴儿配方奶粉至中国和巴西
item.description: 雀巢公司因潜在污染风险，将部分婴儿配方奶粉产品的召回范围从欧洲扩大至中国和巴西。【原文：Nestlé SA widened a recall of some baby formula products beyond Europe to China and Brazil over potential contamination concerns.】

item.title: 美洲原住民团体支持与卡尔希、罗宾汉的法律争斗
item.description: 随着科技公司与部落间的紧张关系不断升级，多家美洲原住民团体已提交法律文件，支持威斯康星州某部落针对预测交易平台运营商Kalshi公司及经纪商Robinhood Markets公司的诉讼。【原文：A slate of Native American groups have filed a legal brief in support of a Wisconsin tribe’s case against prediction marketplace operator Kalshi Inc. and brokerage Robinhood Markets Inc. as tension between the technology companies and tribes escalates.】

item.title: 马杜罗下台后墨西哥对古巴的石油供应将继续
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆宣布，在美方上周扣押委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯·马杜罗后，墨西哥将继续向古巴供应原油，并称墨西哥的部分原油运输属于人道主义援助。【原文：Mexico will continue supplying Cuba with crude oil after the US seized Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro last weekend, President Claudia Sheinbaum announced, describing Mexican shipments in part as humanitarian aid.】

item.title: 哈维资本在首次亮相对冲基金市场时筹集18亿美元
item.description: 前国王街资本管理合伙人保罗·戈德施密德为其专注信贷的对冲基金募集资金逾18亿美元，在众多同行选择为大型多策略公司管理资金之际，这一成绩超出了市场预期。【原文：Former King Street Capital Management partner Paul Goldschmid gathered more than $1.8 billion for his credit-focused hedge fund, surpassing expectations at a time when many others are opting to run money for giant multistrategy firms.】

item.title: 萨克斯债券持有人因破产贷款资金问题争执不休
item.description: 随着萨克斯全球企业加速走向破产，其贷款方正面临一个紧迫问题：他们究竟该向这家资金拮据的奢侈品零售商提供多少贷款——如果说还有必要提供的话？【原文：Lenders to Saks Global Enterprises are grappling with a pressing question as it hurtles toward bankruptcy: How much — if anything at all — should they loan to the cash-strapped luxury retailer?】

item.title: AI21联合创始人称公司曾与英伟达等企业进行早期洽谈
item.description: 总部位于特拉维夫的人工智能初创公司AI21 Labs已与英伟达公司及其他企业进行初步洽谈，但联合创始人阿姆农·沙舒亚表示，目前尚未达成任何协议。【原文：AI21 Labs, a Tel Aviv-based artificial intelligence startup, has held preliminary talks with Nvidia Corp. and other companies, though no deal is imminent, co-founder Amnon Shashua said.】

item.title: 马杜罗遇袭事件凸显网络战手段在美国军事体系中的重要性
item.description: 解析捕获马杜罗行动中的网络战手段【原文：A look at the cyber efforts used in the operation to capture Maduro.】

item.title: 你觉得股市现在很火？
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了奇闻趣事宇宙的每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自专家嘉宾和信息源网络的精彩分享。无论内容如何，我们保证始终引人入胜。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: First Brands警告现金将于1月31日耗尽，被迫出售资产
item.description: 第一品牌集团警告称，若无法立即获得资金注入，公司将在1月底前耗尽现金。这一资金缺口可能迫使这家破产的汽车零部件制造商关闭部分业务并出售其他运营部门。【原文：First Brands Group Inc. warned it will run out of cash by the end of January without an immediate financing injection, a shortfall that could force the bankrupt auto-parts maker to shut down some businesses and sell other operations.】

item.title: 美国开始向全球买家推销委内瑞拉原油
item.description: 美国已开始在全球市场销售委内瑞拉原油，此举可能使其成为全球最具影响力的石油贸易商之一。【原文：The US has begun marketing Venezuelan crude globally, a move that could make it one of the most powerful oil traders in the world.】

item.title: 芝加哥寻求新首席财务官，在争议预算后警告可能裁员
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登·约翰逊表示，他有信心该市将找到新的财政主管，并警告称在预算之争加剧了对收入短缺的担忧后，年中可能出现裁员。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson said he is confident the city will find a new finance chief and warned of possible layoffs by mid-year after a budget battle fueled concerns about revenue shortfalls.】

item.title: 人形机器人在CES展会上倒咖啡、叠衣服。动作慢得令人心疼
item.description: 在本周拉斯维加斯的国际消费电子展上，机器人们相互距离仅几英尺之遥，它们既能冲泡咖啡、打乒乓球、发扑克牌，又能折叠衣物。【原文：At the CES trade show in Las Vegas this week, robots poured coffee, played ping pong, dealt poker hands and folded laundry — all within a few feet of one another.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰BDC允许17%赎回，投资者争相撤离
item.description: 蓝猫资本公司上月遭遇大量赎回申请后，正大幅提高投资者从其某只私募信贷基金中可提取的资金额度。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. is dramatically increasing the amount of money investors can pull from one of its private credit funds after being hit with a deluge of redemption requests last month.】

item.title: KKR支持的Catalio生命科学私募基金超额完成募集目标
item.description: 由KKR & Co.支持的Catalio Capital Management为其专注于生命科学的私募信贷基金筹集了超过3.25亿美元的承诺资金，几乎是该基金前一轮募集金额的四倍。【原文：Catalio Capital Management, backed by KKR & Co., raised more than $325 million in commitments for a private credit fund focuses on life sciences, almost fourfold how much it pulled in for its previous iteration of the vehicle.】

item.title: First Brands创始人指控杰富瑞隐瞒文件
item.description: 第一品牌集团创始人帕特里克·詹姆斯表示，杰富瑞金融集团拒绝移交文件，这些文件将揭穿该金融公司关于他欺诈其公司的指控。【原文：First Brands Group founder Patrick James said Jefferies Financial Group was refusing to turn over documents that would “put the lie” to the financial firm’s claims that he defrauded it.】

item.title: 三星滚动式Ballie机器人因多次延期无限期搁置
item.description: 三星电子公司再次搁置了备受期待的机器人Ballie——这款机器人六年前首次公布，却始终未能面世。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. has once again sidelined Ballie, a long-anticipated robot that was first announced six years ago but never released.】

item.title: 瑞银资本和解方案获瑞士最大政党支持
item.description: 瑞士议会最大党派支持了针对瑞银集团资本要求的妥协方案，使化解僵局的协议前景更近一步。【原文：The largest party in Switzerland’s parliament backed a compromise proposal in the ongoing debate over UBS Group AG’s capital requirements, bringing the prospect of a deal to defuse the standoff a step closer.】

item.title: 法国称欧盟将暂停对化肥征收碳边境税
item.description: 法国农业部长安妮·热内瓦尔表示，欧盟将暂停对化肥征收碳边境税，以帮助陷入困境的农民。【原文：The European Union is set to suspend carbon border levies on fertilizers to help struggling farmers, French Agriculture Minister Annie Genevard said.】

item.title: 特朗普的委内瑞拉赌局让石油成为美国的权力工具
item.description:
美国对尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolás Maduro ）的突然袭击和抓捕可能会重塑能源市场和美国的经济策略。【原文：

The surprise US attack and capture of Nicolás Maduro could reshape energy markets and America’s approach to economic statecraft.

】

item.title: 金银矿商抛售股票速度创十余年来新高
item.description: 去年，金银矿商通过股票发售筹集的资金创下十余年来新高，随着贵金属价格上涨，中小型企业引领了这一趋势。【原文：Gold and silver miners last year raised the most cash through share sales in more than a decade, with smaller players leading the way as precious metal prices rallied.】

item.title: 如果 Stoxx 指数上调，希腊股市有望获得近 10 亿美元资金流入
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Greek equities are set to be upgraded to developed-market status by index provider Stoxx Ltd., a move that could unlock $962 million worth of passive inflows, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 凯雷的 Wise 认为 2025 年 "棘手 "之后，今年将是私募股权交易的丰收年
item.description: 凯雷投资集团的史蒂夫-怀斯（Steve Wise）表示，去年阻碍交易的许多不利因素已经消除，这为该行业在 2026 年的发展奠定了 "非常好 "的基础。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.’s Steve Wise said many of the headwinds that hindered dealmaking last year have cleared, setting up the industry for a “very good” 2026.】

item.title: 就业市场指标相互矛盾，国债反弹戛然而止
item.description: 美国就业情况喜忧参半，国债受到冲击，收益率达到一周以来的最低水平，随后又从最低水平反弹，而交易商则继续押注美联储今年至少会降息两次。【原文：Treasuries were buffeted by mixed indications on US employment, with yields reaching and then rebounding from their lowest levels in a week, while traders kept their bets for at least two Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】
